page.title: 06LOCAL CUSTOMS.
page.content: {WELL-DRESSINGS Well-dressings are put up where ever there is or used to be a well. Well_dressings are made by putting flowers on to clay.People make patterns with the flowers.The well_ dressings are displayed during the last week in August and there are three dressings in Eyam. {CARNIVAL} On the last day of the well_dressings there is a carnival in the village during the parad,s.In the parad,s are people in fancy dress.There are a number of floats both lorries and cars usally there are two or three bands.Many spectators line the rowte. In the evening there is a second parade not all people come to the second parade most people go to the fair.
